attributes.action: Shamima Begum Should never be allowed to return to the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Shamima Begum Joined ISIS, a terrorist organisation.

Shamima Begum Was happy to leave Britain to join isis, despite their record of beheading her compatriots, for murdering gay people, and horrendous crimes against humanity.

Shamima Begum Has clearly stated she has no regrets, and only wants to return to the UK, as she has just given birth to a baby and wants an easier life in the U.K. 

Shamima Begum is a massive threat to the country and should never be allowed to return to the UK
attributes.background:
Shamima Begum Joined ISIS, a terrorist organisation.

Shamima Begum Was happy to leave Britain to join isis, despite their record of beheading her compatriots, for murdering gay people, and horrendous crimes against humanity and extremism.
